settings.text:
Our interest in all-things organic began long before the organic craze hit the States. It didn’t revolve around diet fads or buzzwords or pretty packaging on grocery store shelves, but instead came from one place—our vision of a world where growers, manufacturers, and consumers all came together in the name of better ingredients, sustainable practices, and a happier, healthier planet.

We first founded Pure Ground Ingredients in 2011, but our story starts nearly 20 years prior. Having grown up in a family whose business was fair-trade herbal tea, we always understood the importance of fair-trade—a program that gives products stable prices, ultimately helping farmers and their communities thrive in the face of unpredictable markets. But, what we noticed at the time was a major void in fair-trade ingredients. Fair-trade coffee, tea, and sugar were all readily available...but that was about it. We knew almost immediately that we wanted to help bring a wider range of high-quality, fair-trade, certified-organic ingredients to consumers—and in order to do that, we knew we needed to start at the source: growers around the globe. So, we packed our bags and embarked on the first of many adventures.

settings.heading: THE EXPLORATION THAT STARTED IT ALL

settings.text:
Our first stop was South America where we began the research that we continue to this day—learning every single thing we could about organic growers, their products, and their practices. We slung backpacks over our shoulders, filled our notebooks with every tidbit our eager hands could jot down, caked dirt in our boots, and made friendships with farmers that we maintain to this day. 

From South America we headed to Europe, where the world of organics was far more developed than it was in the United States at the time. Europe was where we first laid eyeson what a thriving organic marketplace looked like—which only served to whet our palette. 

We wanted to know more, so we spent the next ten years of our lives traveling, exploring, and building relationships with growers everywhere from Africa to Indonesia—hand-selecting the best of the best to eventually become Pure Ground partners.

settings.heading: THE GROWTH OF ALL THINGS GOOD

settings.text: Fast-forward 20 years and, while we’ve grown from two to 50 (and counting) employees, many of the growers we use to this day are the same growers we met all those years ago. Relationships are, by far, the most important part of ensuring organic integrity in the ingredients we provide to manufacturers. This is why we’re in it for the long-haul - with our farmers and their communities. We now source ingredients from over 35 different countries and are on a continuous mission to both improve product quality and ensure economic vitality for our farmers and their communities.

We like to think of ourselves as the bridge between farmers of organic ingredients and manufacturers of organic food products—and our most important role is being a friend to both. It didn’t take us long to learn that farmers thrive when manufacturers thrive, and vice-versa—so we work every day to play a role that adds value to both parties.

 Our farmers run small operations and often don’t have the resources they need to get to market on their own... Here we form a bridge: We work with farmers to bring their product to the manufacturers who are looking for it—ultimately helping to bring greater economic value to farmers’ products and their communities. On the other side, we work with manufacturers to source the highest-quality, certified-organic ingredients for their products—ensuring brand integrity and, ultimately, happy consumers.
